remarks: Alternate definition for the "maps to" notation ~ df-mpt2 (although it requires that ` C ` be a set).  (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
dfmpt2.1 $e |- C e. _V $.
dfmpt2 $p |- ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) = U_ x e. A U_ y e. B { <. <. x , y >. , C >. } $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
